content.detailedDescription:
As i watched the sunset and took it photos, i ended up taking a photo to an object not unidentified. 
the event took place on madeira island, in an area without air traffic.
content.summary: Sunset photos with an unidentified object

content.detailedDescription: This report only allows details  for 1 siting. i had 3 of the same thing in 2 different places just a couple days apart. 1st siting was in new mexico. a friend and i were camping. looking up at the stars and the milky way. we both saw this point of light that was acting strange,(moving without changing position, changing colors and blinking. so, i picked up my camera (canon 70d with 500mm lens and tripod with remote) to see if i could see it better and i was totally shocked. then i started to take what shots i could and then i zoomed in my screen on my camera and was absolutely stunned, speechless. i continued to shoot as much as i could. i am a very level headed and rational person. getting excited doesn't take me off my game. 1st, the object started out as an orb of bright light. then gradually a tubular shaped thing started to protrude from the orb until it was very, very long and twisted and curly with many, many different colors (rainbow like). it also continuously kept changing shape the entire time. then it would disappear fast than you can blink. after a while it would come back and do the same thing. also, there was several of these in the sky in different places and different altitudes. each was accompanied by others off in the distance. my friend was with me at the new mexico siting. another friend was with me at the colorado siting. i have about 80 shots and they are very, very crisp considering the distance involved. i prefer not to attach my photos until they are copyrighted. i would be willing to bring them to you on my laptop wherever you are.
content.summary: Orb that morhped into a long tubular and twisted shape with multi colors and costantly changing shape

content.detailedDescription:
My step-son and i headed down for a walk with the dog along lake ontario at the south border of the beaches in toronto. as we started along the boardwalk i had noticed two circular red lights hovering out over lake ontario (southeast from our position).  both we're consistently the same solid red without a bright spot in the center of the light like you'd expect a bulb would give off.  they also both had a slightly muted red attached to the top, like the light was dimly bouncing off a dark surface.  i had mentioned to parker that that seemed weird that they we're just sitting there, not blinking like a normal undercarriage lights on a plane.  it was also strange that they were fairly large for being over a mile out.

the two circular red objects hovered out over lake ontario for about 3-4 minutes as we walked towards the dog park. we continued having our conversation about his sister coming to town, while every 30 seconds or so taking a peek at the lights.  as we reached the west side of the dog park the smallest light started to move and headed due east on a straight path at a quick pace as the other stayed still for thirty more seconds, then started a slow arc back over the city.  as the smallest light hit a due south vector from our position it disappeared (turned off).
content.summary: Two circular red lights hovered out over lake ontario.

content.detailedDescription:
Location: the end of green valley, in suisun/fairfield, ca, at the end of green valley road.
when: around 1973 (i was less than 5 years old)
who: my brother, neighbors, myself and other kids were affected
what: this is based on recollections after the fact that have been pieced together over many years.

i recall a number of times waking up in the middle of the night outside of my house in my jammies. my brother was usually with me, as were my neighborhood kids. sometimes i'd 'awaken' closer to my house, other times i was way down in the field north/north-east of my neighbor's house. i have memories of sometimes going back to bed after 'awakening', and other times i don't remember how i got back to bed.

i remember going with my brother once down to the field by our neighbors house during the day and seeing marks on the ground, and i have a very upset feeling about them, such that i don't want to recall them. they terrify me. my brother saw them as well.

i have a this memory of seeing figures once down in the field. i don't remember what time of day this occurred. i can't confirm the color or height of the beings but they were humanoid but not human. no other positive details about this.

there was an windmill for a well amongst the bushes past our neighbors field and i was terrified of that area. i felt like something was there. this is the field where the marks were found.

i also have memories of white blue light coming in the back windows of our house and both my brother and i sometimes being out in the light. this is the opposite side of the house from our neighbor's field. i have the distinct impression that a craft was causing the light. we were in a deep narrow valley, with our back yard butting very close up against a steep hill such that no human vehicle could have descended down to a point to cause such lights - and why would they?

additionally i have a memory of a classic saucer shaped craft in a different field, next to the house on the other side of us from the one mentioned before. there were multiple lights on it that were colored but mostly whitish. again there was my brother and multiple neighboring kids there along with me.

another occurrence was when i was playing during the day in my bedroom. i was playing with my toy kitchen and drawing. i had this entity with me communicating with me empathically. there were no formal words, just a sense of intention. eventually i wanted to draw a picture of the entity and it indicated that i was doing the eyes wrong and had me look at it to get the eyes correct. i then become very upset because the eyes are not normal human shaped but large, dark, slanted, almond shaped eyes. the entity didn't want me to become upset. it then left by climbing out the window. i realize after it left that the window is closed so i become even more upset. this occurrence happened during the summer or spring because i remember it being sunny and warm outside, it was the middle of the day, but i didn't have my window open. that's why my noticing that the window was actually closed sticks out.
content.summary: Multiple experiences in local when less then 5 years old, my brother, neighbor, other kids and i abducted.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i after walking a friend to the train station desided to 
buy pizza and walk home together on 115st lexington ave. manhattan.
while walking i seem to notice this object in the sky that seemed very strange and unlike 
a plane or helicopter. i pointed it out to her and we both were puzzled as to what it was so we continued to observe it and it's flight pattern. as it moved accross us in passed over and seem to disappear.. when we looked toward were we first saw it another one appeared!! we were amazed at its shape and look. ( bright orange ) the second one was going in the same direction as the first. that's when things got exciting!! as one after another passed by! 
i felt i had to record it! i took out my phone and proceeded to record the objects with amazement!  a older man and what seem to be his teen age daughter then asked what we were doing and looked up in amazement. we all tried to determine what these things were! drones? no!  to big to be drones.. it didn't give off any light or beakon.
one after another seem to come out of nowhere! all going in the same direction.. i couldn't get the shot i wanted and grew nervous at the fact there were so many of them so i stopped recording and opened a app on my phone that's like binoculars and proceeded to snap close up pictures. so i have both video and photos of these things! this needs to be investigated!
the faa should know about this as to the fact that there were up to 25 of these things and could have cause a in air collision! why would there be so many drones passing by if that's what they were? which they weren't! (if you see the video) this is a must see!  my email address is noel42268@yahoo.Com i already put this on facebook and all my friends say i must report this!  i'm sending a couple picture you need to zoom in on but they are amazing!
the video i would like to tell you has a dot that moves around a lot don't pay attention to it.
that was a light reflection. pay attention to the right of the screen.
content.summary: Seem to be cresant in shape.

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:00 pm my boyfriend and i were playing a game at a golf course. it was dark out. clear sky's beautiful night. i'm always looking up at the sky i'm a strong believer in aliens and ufos. i was looking up to see if i saw a shooting star then i saw an orb of light, small looking like a star. i told my boyfriend to look up at the sky. we both saw this orb going fast weaning in and out of stars and then disappearing.  it kind of just disappeared, it didn't really fade it just short of "turned off". it didn't last long but was very exciting! i love when i can see something like that happen. this summer was pretty active with ufos for me. i'm a strong believer and i started to cry from happiness. haha call me what you want but they are out there!
content.summary: Saw orb of light going in and out of stars then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was working in the oilfield the graveyard shift. i was looking up at the sky when i saw this big single light coming towards my direction. i did not have a camera. i only had my i pad. by the time i went to retrieve it there were two lights then three. it started to circle the gas well. then it just hovered for a short while. then all of a sudden between the front and the middle of this object it started shooting this brown stuff. i don't know what it was but i don't know how to explain it just take a look.
content.summary: Triangular and started shooting this brown stuff out of front of object.

content.detailedDescription: on aug 22 2015 i was out on my mothers back porch, around 930 pm and i saw these orange colored lights with red glowing fuzzy lights around the orange circle these lights seemed to be traveling from left ne to south east.Just crossing the sky in front of me. these lights just kept coming from the left to the right. there must have been 30 to forty of them although i didnt count them. they crossed in front of me and disappeared to the southeast. i called my brother and mother out of the house to watch and see if they knew what the lights were.We could not. the lights were in a formation which could have been in groups of threes but we do not really know, the lights just kept coming.As the last one appeared it also passed from left to right then disappeared. i did see an airliner pass above the lights. the plane was smaller then the lights. we checked all the local aqnd national news channels and nothing was mentioned.
content.summary: Numerous red and orange lights crossing the sky from left to right or nort6h esast to southeast

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home and making a turn on to a dead end road the car lights shone on a metal object
between trees in conservation area.  it moved very slow and intermittent metal sounds came
from it. no lights at all. the windows were also dark. i turned off the car lights so it wouldn't
see us. (my two children were with me).  i believe the object to be cigar shaped because it
appeared to be moving along an old cartway that goes through conversation land. the cartway would be too narrow for a sauer that had that many windows in a row. after i pulled
into our driveway, my son and i sat on the hood of the car because we could still hear the
noise but my daughter ran in the house and hid under her bed.

many things happened at our house during the eighties. the one that was the high point was when my daughter wanted to sleep with me in the water bed. i awoke to waves coming from
the end of the bed. i sat partially up only to see a small grey person (it looked like a grey) at
the foot of the bed. i screamed and it actually smiled with its slit mouth and that is all i
remover until the next morning when my mother asked be if i had a bad dream because i
was screaming. i said no then it came to me and i told her about the incident.  my daughter 
piped up and said she saw him running out the door. this person was much shorter than the 
four feet they say they are.
content.summary: Sighting while driving at night

content.detailedDescription:
I was making a coffee close to 10pm and always look out of the kitchen window filling the kettle and saw a light in front on me glowing orange/yellow and so i rushed to get my camera and took two pictures as the light changed from a long shape then bend and glowing, so i pop outside to look closer and don't hear nothing just see the glowing shape then it goes dark.

so i go back in and 30mins later i hear the helicopter  fly over in from east to west around 10:20pm i do hear helicopters and other planes from the raf bases in the area but not this late.
content.summary: Glowing shape changing light floating

content.detailedDescription: I was carrying my shopping near bury market lancashire about 10.15 am the fairly warm day quite a few clouds in the sky.I just happened to glance up and noticed 5 black objects quite high up in the sky. at first i thought aerial display but they were swirling around each other. it looks like a game of tag. i walked into the outside market which is closed today to get a closer look. all of the objects climbed higher and 3 shot straight up into the clouds and disappeared. the other 2 objects circled close together before also shooting up behind a cloud until icould no longer see anything. i know it wasn't birds and i originally thought they looked like ww1 planes. there was no noise no lights just black and definitely a flying object. i was mesmerized by this experience. just can't explain it. i did not think to take a photo with my camera i just could not take my eyes off what i saw until the objects disappeared.
content.summary: 5 objects looks like they were playing tag 3 shot into cloud and disappeared last 2 swirled around and shot up into clouds and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My father and i was coming home from enon ohio .Going north on enon rd .1st noticed a light in the distance . thought it was a light in a window .We had to turn west on lower valley pike ,going west towards it . as we got closer to the our next turn [approx 1 mile west]to donnelsville-n.Hampton rd .It got closer and and alot larger . as we reached our next turn , it was directly above us , at tree top level . it was perfectly round , made no sound what so ever .It was a bright orange , solid in appearance .And was huge . the best i know how describe the size is -- i believe a b-52 bomber could set on top of it [if it was flat] and no part of plane would hang over .It was close enough that you cold have hit it with a baseball . the car ,stalled ,and it hovered above us for a cpl of mins . then in a matter of seconds it ascended at an amazing speed , in a  easterly direction and disappeared .At the time of the encounter we were approximately 4 mi as the crow flies , from w.P.A.B . .Which is the direction it came from .As i was a child at the time , it really scared me .And my father ,who was a combat veteran of ww2, and was rattled also .And my father wasnt afraid of anything . my father called wright patterson the following morning and reported what we seen , and he was told not to mention it to anyone , and if he did they would make a fool out him .Ive always wanted to report what happened that night , but didnt want to be labeled crazy .My father only mentioned it a cpl of times to me , and i think im the one who brought it up .It definitely was a traumatic incident that has stayed with me my entire life .I just think this should be on record somewhere .          wayne r mcdaniel
content.summary: Huge disc shaped ufo hovered directly above us 20 to 30 ft .Close towpafb

content.detailedDescription: I was out fishing in the yellowstone river one evening when the pictures were taken.It was around 7:30 or 8:00 p.M. and i took a few of the sun behind the clouds but something kept grabbing my attention about that particular area.I kept feeling like i needed to take more pictures towards that direction. i noticed the object in one picture moving towards the cloud, and when looking at the picture before, i noticed it in the trees across the river from me. it has a strange green glow. i can't say what it was but i definitely believe that it's possibly a u.F.O. and i wanted experts to have a look.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the sunset while fishing and i noticed the object in both pictures. ..Afterwards. ..

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside my house with my sister when both of us saw a rectangular shaped craft fly straight over our heads she went inside because she was scared i stood outside for 10 more minutes and saw a second craft fly over to my left so there are two rectangular shaped you up on as a no sound as they flew over and they had like round vents the object was approximately hundred foot above us and i could see the craft as clear as day they didn't scare me i was curious where they were heading in i watched for a bit and then they disappeared i wished i would've had time to take some pictures it was the most incredible thing i've ever seen  i think the craft was either extraterrestrial an origin or maybe some extreme technology from our own base area 51 i don't know for sure but i'll that if it was alien and origin or if they come in peace i would love to know if anyone else saw that on the night of april 6, 2014 this is not the first night i have seen things flying through the sky and like i was sue and my son has also seen things fly through the sky with me
content.summary: Rectangular shape flew overhead east direction no sound no lights witnessed witnessed by my sister joslin everett

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from a bbq at a friends house. i was traveling west on interstate 40 when i noticed three bright lights that were moving just under the low cloud cover. it had rained lightly half an hour before this time so the clouds were low. i then realized the three lights were glowing spots on the underside of a craft that i was seeing. the craft passed silently over me, then proceeded west gaining speed over the mountains. i managed to get my phone out any take a picture before driving around the mountain to where the flight path would be visible. by the time i traveled around to see approximately a minute later the craft was no longer visible due to clouds.

during the flyover i noticed the white to golden, flickering, pulsating lights in a v shape on the bottom surface of the black to charcoal, circular craft. the surface texture was hard to observe as the ship was gaining altitude into slight cloud cover. when it was visible the texture seemed metallic, black, rough but not reflective. there was an effect of the bottom surface of the craft that made the clarity rough or fuzzy looking. no noises were heard, a lack of noise is more accurate as the craft moved. the rate of acceleration was quick, once it cleared the mountain top and partially in the cloud cover. this was not a jet, or helicopter, it was some sort of craft that is solid. the clouds didn't shroud it like a normal jet passes through the clouds. the craft looked more distorted as it got closer to the altitude of the clouds as if it were mimicking the visual effect of cloud cover.

my initial reaction was amazement to the lights then a sudden surge of wonder to what it could be. i grabbed my phone and took pictures while speeding up to proceed around the bend of the mountains. in  the minute it took me to travel around the mountain, the craft had disappeared into the clouds.
content.summary: Massive, silent ufo flyover while driving west on i40, pictures taken

content.detailedDescription: The object moved and then stopped & then moved &estoppel & moved until i was blocked by rock formations .My son & brother in law & i were camping that night when i observed this object .I have seen a comet in south chicago and it didn't move like a comet because this object stopped & and then moved . when we came back the next day the news had what the pilot had filmed and it was the same as i saw. if i were guessing i would  think it was ultra high altitude . this night was one of the clearest nights i had experienced in the malibu  area .I believe it was jan .1 ,1979 evening
content.summary: Camping in malibu canyon and witnessed the object over head very high and stationary and it moved west in the sky ( australian pilot filmed what i saw)

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside watching my dog king play for a bit when i noticed a big star but then i realized the star started to move so i knew i saw another ufo in my lifetime i seen three so i called my girl out so she can see because people think im crazy when i talk about this stuff so she came out and saw the star figure slowly fainting away then all of a sudden just disappeared just never ever wanted to talk about this topic but i know we're not alone!!!
content.summary: Star disapered slowly going south

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in the back yard on the phone when i saw the bright red light slowly rising into the sky. it caught my eye from the bright color and the movement. i first thought it was a firework going up but realized it was moving too slowly and no explosion. the object slowly rose up to about the height of low flying planes usually spotted in the area and then moved west. it appeared to be like a candle flame in shape almost and it was a very intense light. i watched it until it approached the treeline and was gone from my sight. appeared to be growing smaller as it moved.
content.summary: Strange slow moving red fire like object

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my back yard with 2 friends on the night of 8/13/15 to observe the meteor shower.  there was not a lot of "falling stars" happening, so we were just staring off in different directions to see what we could see.  there were no lights on in the house, and no "light pollution" from the front of the house.  the most light we had outside that night was the construction lights for the highway a couple of blocks away to the south, giving the horizon a yellowish glow, so we just avoided looking in that direction. we live in a house backed by empty and unused fields, so i was excited to have no lights to mess with our vision as well.  around 11:30 p.M., i observed what i had originally thought to be a shooting star moving west to east. as it got closer to me, i realized several things that stuck with me: it never changed speed, it never changed altitude, it didn't put off any light (like a "falling star" would), and it was absolutely silent.  i followed it from horizon to horizon until i couldn't see it anymore, and while it didn't put off any light, it appeared to be a dark gray or brownish color.  it was a "v" shape, and it was blocking the light from the stars as it passed over me.  

sorry for reporting this so late, but i am honestly not sure what i saw. it has been haunting me though, always kind of in the back of my mind at weird times since i saw the thing.

i just thought i would throw the information at someone who knew what to do with it and see if you had received any other reports from the area that night.

take care.
content.summary: "v" shaped, silent, dark gray/brownish in appearance

content.detailedDescription: I was a the beach. it was independence day, so we had a vacation. after dinner, we saw a green light on the beach. i thought it's a toy brought by a guest at the hotel. it rose, and then it moved from north to east, rising while turning. it sounded like a helicopter.  what i hadn't seen earlier was a dark oval shape behing the green light. i feared being abducted. i began to chase it. i then lost sight of it as i went back to the hotel room.
content.summary: Green light

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and myself were sleeping in our bedroom. i woke up and saw this creature standing next to my husband. it was dark with just enough light coming in so i could see it. i immediately knew it was not something human. the first thing that came to my mind was it was an alien. the creature was about 4 foot tall and i could only see it's head because it was standing on the other side of the bed next to my husbands head. it had a large head,large eyes and i believe it was grey in color. it did not move at all just stood there. i sat up and tried to warn my husband to get away from it. i tried to shake him and tried to yell.  i couldn't move, couldn't speak. then there was a bright light outside, the whole area was lit up like daylight, and my husband was outside, floating limply, up into the sky.  he looked like he was still sleeping.  i really don't know how long he was gone. i'm assuming it put me back to sleep because i have no memory of what happened next until i woke up later in the night and my husband was there sleeping again. i was really scared and crying. i woke him up and he had no memory of this.
a couple of weeks later, he woke up with this wound on his arm in the morning. he saw it on his arm when he looked in the bathroom mirror when he first got up and he showed it to me. he said there was no pain.  it was not there when he went to sleep the night before. i took a picture of it right away. as you can see it's a row of puncture wounds. he does not have any memory of this happening to him either.  i was telling this to a friend of ours and he suggested i tell you.  so here i am
content.summary: Did not see the ufo just the entity
content.locationName: Little Egg Harbor Township, New Jersey

content.detailedDescription: As i said above the sphere started out like a small star then like a dimmer switch being turned on it got larger and brighter, then blinked out, this happened 3 times then it shot strait up into space and it was gone,this all took place in about 1 min.
content.summary: sphere shaped lit up like a dimmer switch, was small then got larger as light in tensed then blinked out did that 3 times then gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the moon on august 23, 2015 at approximately 8:16 pm.  i saw an object next to the moon but just slightly lower than the moon.  at first the object appeared to be a bright star or planet.  however, the object was in motion and descending straight downward.  i attempted to take a picture but i was unsuccessful.  there were too many tree branches in the way and i had to constantly walk in order to try and keep the object in sight.  within several seconds or so the object was too low in the horizon for me to see it.  the shape of the object was vertically oblong.  the object was white in color.  i speculated that the object could have be a hot air ballon on fire, a small aircraft on fire or a potential meteorite.  since i was in a highly populated area at the time of the sighting there must have been many others who saw it.
content.summary: White object descending straight down

content.detailedDescription:
My fiance and i went up north for my cousins wedding in lovells michigan off shupack lake on july 27th 2012. a group of 7 of us decided to go for a walk the night before the wedding around 1:30am. we walked down trails that led us out to the main road where we originally turned to enter the campground. we all stopped to talk and look up at the stars considering we don't have the pleasure of observing the night sky without city lights. it was a clear night and the moon lit up the sky. we could see the tree line for miles following the road to the south east of us. 

a few minutes after looking up, we noticed a bright red orb shaped light high in the sky. at first we thought it was a planet until a second bright red orb shape separated from it. one red orb stayed in the same spot as the second one slowly moved to the west maintaining the same horizontal position as the first orb. we all asked each other if we all were seeing the same thing, making sure our eyes weren't playing tricks on us. 

the second orb that moved toward the west then dropped hundreds of feet in a split second and continued moving west in a straight line. then shot up about half the distance it originally fell from and quickly moved to the east in a precise straight line.

the first orb held its position as the other one maneuvered around. after a couple minutes the first orb that held its position began to move as well in the same manner. then they came together one above the other, there was a significant amount of space between them, and stayed in that position for a brief moment. the red orb that was on the bottom slowly started to descend, this time at about a 40 degree angle as if it was coming in for landing. we watched until the red orb fell slowly into the tree line and was out of our site. the other red orb then shot up into the sky and disappeared. 

i would say we were about a mile or two from where the red orb went below the tree line.

all of us were so scared after we couldn't see it beyond the tree line. we walked really fast back to the campground. we still tell our story to people and still have no explanation. we are hoping someone else might have seen the same thing we did, but could see where that second red orb went after we lost sight of it when it went passed the tree line.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright red light split into 2 hovering than fast directional changes with one descending below tree line

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter (36) myself (54) and a friend ,male (41) went to my property to camp over a four day weekend starting on thur july 23,2015 with two other people both males for a total of five of us. on fri the 24th it was very hot 98-100 f we had planed a hike in a near by canyon(10-15mil away by dirt road( utv/moto-bike travel ) but do to the heat only 3 of us decided to go on the hike.

my daughter and i drove in our utv and the friend, road his off road moto bike, we lead he followed all the way there about a 1/4 mil. behind us do to road dust,

we hiked till 3pm and headed back to camp, 3-4 miles into heading back the friend passed us and went ahead, 
as we were moving along at around 20-25 mph my daughter said stop dad stop stop, i stop in just a few seconds as she said.. what is that what is that! i leaned back in my set looking over her back looking up at the ridge top and at first i didn't see anything but then as i leaned back further and looked forward.. there it was,
 
it was a  crescent shaped craft hovering just above the ridge,it was translucent white and curved down to a sharp point on both ends, it hovered for about 10 seconds then started to descend down behind the ridge, as it did it started to glow very brightly in a orangish earth tone color, there were pine trees spaced out right on the ridge top  and it was at lest 6-8 trees wide (guessing 150-200 feet wide)
it went down behind the ridge out of sight..As we sat there looking to see if it would come back up my daughter said it was moving along the ridge top slowly in the same direction we were traveling and when we stopped... it stopped its forward motion and just hovered, that is at the point i saw it,(when it was just hovering) we stayed there for 10-15 min and didn't see it come back up so we moved on, 
as we went up the road we saw our friend on his moto bike waiting on the side of road for us to catch up, he said what took so long? and we told him what happened, later he did confirmed he did sit there for 10-15 min waiting for us.

 back at camp my daughter was very upset and did not talk much for over the next 4hr. the area this happened in dose not get many riders/visitors, we did not see any one else that whole day going to the hike or on our way back. the canyon we were in has high canyon wall on both sides of the road, this is an area i know very well and don't need maps to get around

shortly after we got back to camp one of the other men there split us up and had us draw what we saw, the pictures we drew that day are in this report.
content.summary: Crescent shape translucent craft moving horizontally across ridge top slowly then stoping when we did and descending behind ridge.

content.detailedDescription: Returning home after an evening church service, i noticed a large cigar-shaped craft "gliding" through the night sky approximately 150 ft above the tree line. initially i thought it was blimp-type object until i realized the intensity of its radiating red/orange lights. it emanated from within the craft. as it picked up speed, it eventually began to hover over the wooded area adjacent to my home. i was able to capture some of it on my  iphone. although what i caltured on camera doesn't seem to fully capture the reality of what we were witnessing. i was left feeling totally overwhelmed by the incident.
content.summary: Witness a ufo during the month of august.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my backyard at around 5:30pm smoking a cigarette when something caught my attention out of the corner of my eye. what i observed was a white/cloud like color sphere object moving west to east. i was only able to see this object for like 2 secs before it went into a cloud. i waited to see if it would come out the other side because this object looked like a white/cloud color perfect sphere and i though this was odd. i waited for about a minute to see if it would come out the other side but it never did. i first thought it might of been a balloon but at the level of the cloud that it went into, it would of have to been a pretty large balloon to appear about the size of the object i saw. it could of been a weather balloon but it wasn't gaining altitude and was traveling west to east at about 300mph. i found the object very odd to see in the sky and that's what made me search online to see if anyone else saw this object but i couldn't find anyone. i wouldn't of came onto this site if i didn't think it was strange to see. in my 27 years on this earth i've never seen something that perfect of a sphere flying and be the same color of the cloud it went into.
content.summary: Saw something out of the corner of my eye they looked at it for 2 secs

content.detailedDescription: Looked out the window to check if it was raining and was surprised to see lights hovering above nearby buildings. object made no noise at all.
content.summary: Flashing lights hovering over buildings

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were sitting on my front porch, when we were watching a jet fly over head, you could hear it, and as it flew away,to the right i noticed a roundish object, with a bright white light, all around it, moving very slowly,it looked like it was higher then the jet. no sound at all, it hovered and then it was gone. it just disappeared. my sister and i were shocked, i took a video of it on my phone.
content.summary: Object sighted, round or oval, bright, no noise,hovered, and traveling very slowly.Then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep on second floor and awoke suddenly.  my window was open and i turned over on the bed.  i looked out the window and noticed a triangular object which i thought was a helicopter.  it had green, yellow, blue, red lights pulsing.  the object was stationary and then abruptly dropped straight down rapidly, disappearing behind cloud cover.  i was afraid and got up and shut my bedroom window, then went back to bed.  the following night, i didn't open my window when going to bed.  i woke again sometime in the night and saw the object which appeared to be closer than the previous night.  in fact, it looked like it was at roof line.  i was terrified; however, the next thing i remember was it was morning.  since these sightings i have been physically sick.  i haven't seen this object since then.
content.summary: Ufo observed two nights in a row
